tokens.text: validates cooperative add-on item naming conventions

title: Coop Item Naming
description: Validates individual content items against Cooperative Add-On naming conventions and structure requirements. Ensures items use properly namespaced identifiers to avoid conflicts with other add-ons.

fields.title: BAC ID Format
fields.description: Error when a behavior animation controller ID doesn't follow the format 'controller.animation.xyz'. Use the correct prefix structure.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid behavior animation controller ID

fields.title: BAC Name Format
fields.description: Error when the name portion of a behavior animation controller doesn't follow 'creatorshortname_projectshortname' format. Use namespaced naming.
fields.technicalDescription: Data contains the invalid BAC name portion
